localstorage: Favorite cities are stored using local storage. No personal data is stored.
error: We couldn't find the place you were searching for. Please try again.
searchtext: For searching type in the search bar.
menutext: Favorite cities and settings are in the menu at the top.
compassinfo: This feature is only available on devices with iOS and iPadOS.
compasstext: From release of iOS 13 user permission is required. Click to grant permission for location access to use the compass.
